Intraoperative tumor localization resection enhance use intraoperative imaging technique ( e.g . target radioguided fluorescence guide surgery ) . A powerful synergy achieve combine radiotracers ( e.g . Indium-111 ) optical tracer ( e.g . IRDye 800CW ) conjugate antibody tumor-associated antigen . Therefore Indium-111-DOTA-girentuximab-IRDye800CW perfect dual-labeled antibody dual-modality image-guided surgery RCC . The concept show preclinical study mice investigator translate clinic .
